Converter¶

ctools.Converter.convert_units(arg, unit)¶

Checks compatibility and converts units using simtk.units package

Args:
arg (Quantity): quantity to be converted unit (Unit): Unit to be converted to
Returns:
arg (Quantity): Quantity scaled to the new unit
